equipment.name: Main Battle Tanks
equipment.description: Versatile tanks with balanced armor, firepower, and mobility. Perfect for various combat situations.

equipment.name: Light Tanks
equipment.description: Fast and agile vehicles ideal for reconnaissance and hit-and-run tactics.

equipment.name: Heavy Tanks
equipment.description: Powerful armored vehicles with devastating firepower, but slower movement speed.

equipment.name: Tank Destroyers
equipment.description: Specialized vehicles with powerful anti-tank weapons and enhanced camouflage.

equipment.name: Self-Propelled Artillery
equipment.description: Long-range support vehicles capable of delivering devastating indirect fire.
